MemoryInfobox.name: Spy vs. Friend
MemoryInfobox.description: 'An area of burnt forest took on brief strategic importance when Spartan spies, Athens|Athenian spies, and Mercenary|mercenaries all occupied it at the same time.'

General_Description: '''Spy vs. Friend''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A [[Sparta]]n spy sought the help of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''What's the difference between an [[Athens|Athenian]] sword and a Spartan sword? The Spartan sword has been used.'' She sought out the spy and addressed him. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I saw the note you posted. What's the matter?'' *'''Man:''' ''Be warned. Athens has spies in these woods.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''So does Sparta, it seems.'' *'''Man:''' ''True. But those Athenians have a battle plan that we can't let get out.'' |-|You want it brought back to you.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''And you want me to get it from the Athenians.'' *'''Man:''' ''That's exactly it. Will you do it for me?'' |-|You want all the Athenians dead.= (Accept - I'll bring it to you.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''All right. I'll do it.'' *'''Man:''' ''Thank you. This must be done carefully.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll come back when I'm done.'' Kassandra did as asked, and then returned to the spy. *'''Man:''' ''Did you get it?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''It's all yours.'' *'''Man:''' ''Sparta owes you a great deal. Take this.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''All in a day's work.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
